MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am in order to install bird diverters to our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:46am on Friday, 05 February 2021
